description: Try our easy to follow Sangria recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sangria Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 orange, halved, sliced, cut into small wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Put apple, orange and sugar in a large bowl and mix, muddling lightly with a wooden spoon, for 1 minute.
Add orange juice and brandy and stir, pressing on fruit, for another 30 seconds. Divide mixture between 2 large jugs. Pour a bottle of wine into each jug and stir to combine.
Pour half the soda water into each jug. Serve over ice in tall glasses. Add mint leaves.
